title: Jordan Was Quarantining In the 90s, Is THIS Our King? 5.5.20
itunes:title: Jordan Was Quarantining In the 90s, Is THIS Our King? 5.5.20
description:
In episode 623, Jack and Miles are joined by quar-bae Jamie Loftus to discuss Mike Pence admitting he should have worn a mask at the Mayo Clinic, Trumps new war on surgical masks, coronavirus data, The Last Dance recaps, a Florida man living in Disney World, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pence Admits He Should’ve Worn A Mask During Mayo Clinic Tour
  2. Trump World Turns on the True COVID Villain: Surgical Masks
  3. US coronavirus data is at odds with Trump’s push to get the economy back up and running
  4. 34 days of pandemic: Inside Trump’s desperate attempts to reopen America
  5. Coronavirus Live Updates: Trump Administration Models Predict Near Doubling of Daily Death Toll by June
  6. She Predicted the Coronavirus. What Does She Foresee Next?
  7. ‘The Last Dance’ Episode 5 recap: Michael Jordan was Kobe Bryant’s ‘big brother’
  8. ‘The Last Dance’ Episode 6 recap: Being Michael Jordan was ‘an impossible task’
  9. Alabama man arrested for camping out in coronavirus-shuttered Disney World
  10. WATCH: Matt Martians Ft. Steve Lacy - Pony Fly

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
